MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ、元通りになってる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, it has turned back to normal...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, it has turned back to normal...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 板は修繕されていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The blackboard had been repaired.
MESSAGE.Translation: The blackboard had been repaired.

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「じゃ、今度はこいつでぶち破りましょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Okay, this time we're going to use this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Okay, this time we're going to use this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言って、最終兵器のような銃を設置し始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She said that and began to set up a gun that had the air of an ultimate weapon.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said that and began to set up a gun that had the air of an ultimate weapon.

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「設置完了。発砲準備」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Setup complete. Preparing to fire.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Setup complete. Preparing to fire.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女が三脚を押さえつけ、僕に命令した。
MESSAGE.EN: She pressed down the tripod, commanding me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pressed down the tripod, commanding me.

MESSAGE.JP: が重いけど、仕方がない。何が仕方がないのかもよくわからないけど、自分でも不思議なことに、これは仕方がないことなんだ、と割り切れている『自分』がいる。
MESSAGE.EN: I really didn't want to do it, but did I have a choice? I felt I had to, even though I couldn't explain why.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really didn't want to do it, but did I have a choice? I felt I had to, even though I couldn't explain why.

MESSAGE.JP: どど！
MESSAGE.EN: Rat-tat-tat!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rat-tat-tat!

MESSAGE.JP: を空ける、というより、破壊した。
MESSAGE.EN: The cave was opened, or more precisely, blasted open.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cave was opened, or more precisely, blasted open.

MESSAGE.JP: 板は跡形もない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no trace of the blackboard left.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no trace of the blackboard left.

MESSAGE.JP: して、中心にぽっかり丸形の入り口。
MESSAGE.EN: Furthermore, in the middle of it was a wide circular entrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Furthermore, in the middle of it was a wide circular entrance.

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「さ、行きましょう、相棒さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Let's go, partner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Let's go, partner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たりがかりで大きな銃を運んで、横穴を進む。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us carried the gun and advanced toward the cave.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us carried the gun and advanced toward the cave.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の足が止まり、僕はその銃の尻に頭を打つ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She stopped walking and I hit my head against the gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stopped walking and I hit my head against the gun.

MESSAGE.JP: 子の上に辿りついたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed we'd reached the top of the ladder.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed we'd reached the top of the ladder.

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「ふたりで同時に降りるわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝We will go down at the same time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝We will go down at the same time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「この銃ごと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝With this gun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝With this gun?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「さっき教室でしたように、あたしがすぐ三脚に銃を正しく設置するから、合図したら、あなたはトリガーを引く。そうすれば何もかも灰燼に帰すわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Just like back in the classroom, I will set up the tripod for the gun. Once that's done, you will pull the trigger. If we do that, everything will be reduced to ashes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Just like back in the classroom, I will set up the tripod for the gun. Once that's done, you will pull the trigger. If we do that, everything will be reduced to ashes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: べてが灰燼に帰す…。
MESSAGE.EN: Reducing everything to ashes...
MESSAGE.Translation: Reducing everything to ashes...

MESSAGE.JP: なんて恐ろしいことをしようとしてるんだ、僕は…。
MESSAGE.EN: What horrifying thing was I about to do...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What horrifying thing was I about to do...?

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝What? Are you scared?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝What? Are you scared?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「まー、注意力はないほうだもんね、理樹くんは」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Well, you lack concentration after all, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Well, you lack concentration after all, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなもの、注意力とか関係ないじゃん…。
MESSAGE.EN: Concentration had nothing to do with it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Concentration had nothing to do with it...

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Let's go, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Let's go, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はうん、と頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「あっちも男らしくできたんだから、大丈夫よ。自信持ちなさいよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝You acted like a man back then, so it'll be alright. Have more confidence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝You acted like a man back then, so it'll be alright. Have more confidence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あっちって…キス？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you referring to the time we... kissed?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you referring to the time we... kissed?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「ばっ、ばばばばばばばばば…っばか！　何よっ、うるさいわねっ、一言余計よっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝I, iiiiiiiiidiot!　What, shut up, that was one word too many!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝I, iiiiiiiiidiot!　What, shut up, that was one word too many!❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「なっにがあっちも男らしくできました、よっ！　そんな自信覗かせて天狗になってんじゃないわよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝You seriously think you did that like a man!? Don't get cocky!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝You seriously think you did that like a man!? Don't get cocky!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわぁ、評価ががた落ちした！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, your opinion of me is plummeting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, your opinion of me is plummeting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなに駄目だったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So I was that terrible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So I was that terrible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「え、いや…そんな駄目なことは…なかったわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Ah, no... you weren't... that bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Ah, no... you weren't... that bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…ほんと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「うん…だから銃のほうもちょっとは自信持ちなさいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Yeah... so have more confidence with the gun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Yeah... so have more confidence with the gun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やったー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yay!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yay!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「そんな喜ばないでよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Don't be so happy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Don't be so happy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「というか、真上でこれだけ騒いでいて敵に気づかれていないか、ちゃんと奇襲になるのか、不安になってきたわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝By the way, aren't we making a lot of noise? I'm worried that the enemy may notice and that would spoil our surprise attack.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝By the way, aren't we making a lot of noise? I'm worried that the enemy may notice and that would spoil our surprise attack.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「きっと大丈夫だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure it's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure it's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「あっちをちょっと褒められただけで、随分と脳天気なキャラになったものね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝You sure have become optimistic after being praised a little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝You sure have become optimistic after being praised a little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、僕できましたとか言ってませんし、ぜんぜん自信なんかありませんからっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No no, I didn't say I could do it, and I still have no self confidence...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No no, I didn't say I could do it, and I still have no self confidence...❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「じ、自信は持ちなさいよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝H-have more confidence in yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝H-have more confidence in yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「もちろん、その銃のほうよ。あっちじゃないわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝I mean with the gun, not that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝I mean with the gun, not that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかってるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I get it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I get it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@$S020「ああ、もうひとつ訂正っ。別に誰かと比べたわけではなく、その、平均値を予想してというか、つまりはあたし初めてなので安心して、いやっ…ようは詳しい振りしてごめんなさい、さ、いきましょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ $S020❝Ah, one more correction. I didn't mean what I said like I was comparing you to someone, I was just saying that based on my expectations of what the norm should be, in other words, it was my first time, so don't worry, ah no... I mean, sorry for acting like I know a thing, l-let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ $S020❝Ah, one more correction. I didn't mean what I said like I was comparing you to someone, I was just saying that based on my expectations of what the norm should be, in other words, it was my first time, so don't worry, ah no... I mean, sorry for acting like I know a thing, l-let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「忙しい人だなあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're all over the place...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're all over the place...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いうか、真上でこんなに騒がしくしていて、敵に気づかれていないのか、ちゃんと奇襲になるのか、そっちのほうが心配だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, with all this noise we were making, I was worried that the enemy would notice and if that would spoil our surprise attack.
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, with all this noise we were making, I was worried that the enemy would notice and if that would spoil our surprise attack.

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「まー、『キス』もできないお子様だから仕方ないわねぇ、よしよし」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Well, it's normal that kids don't know how to ❛kiss,❜ so there, there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Well, it's normal that kids don't know how to ❛kiss,❜ so there, there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なり根に持たれてるぞ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She held quite the grudge...
MESSAGE.Translation: She held quite the grudge...

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「さ、お喋りはここまでよ。いくわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝That's enough talk. Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝That's enough talk. Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うやく緊迫感が出てくる。僕はうん、と頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could feel the tension. I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could feel the tension. I nodded.

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Ready, set, go!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Ready, set, go!❞

MESSAGE.JP: リガーから指を離した。
MESSAGE.EN: I removed my finger from the trigger.
MESSAGE.Translation: I removed my finger from the trigger.

MESSAGE.JP: 硝の匂いが立ちこめている。
MESSAGE.EN: The smell of gunpowder filled the place.
MESSAGE.Translation: The smell of gunpowder filled the place.

MESSAGE.JP: けた壁の粉塵が霧のように舞って視界は閉ざされていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The dust from the broken wall danced around like mist, blocking my vision.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dust from the broken wall danced around like mist, blocking my vision.

MESSAGE.JP: (2,0)はハンカチを口に当てて、それを吸わないようにしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: $(2,1) put the handkerchief to her mouth, trying not to breathe in the dust.
MESSAGE.Translation: $(2,1) put the handkerchief to her mouth, trying not to breathe in the dust.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「全滅？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did we get them all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did we get them all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「このフロアはね」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝On this floor, at least.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝On this floor, at least.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「さて、階下へテレポートするわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Well then, we are teleporting to the lower floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Well then, we are teleporting to the lower floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ、どうやって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, how?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, how?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「それはこれで」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝This is how.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝This is how.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんとかという機関銃をぽん、と叩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She fired the M-something machine gun, *bang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: She fired the M-something machine gun, *bang*!

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「入り口だって、仕掛けも解かずにぶち破ってきたんだから、もうどうでもいいじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝You can make an entrance without solving the puzzles by just blasting your own path, that's fine right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝You can make an entrance without solving the puzzles by just blasting your own path, that's fine right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな力業でいいのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder if doing that is okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder if doing that is okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「いいのよ。向こうだって、頭数ばかり揃えて…掟破りはお互いさまよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝It's fine. There are more shadows than there should be... we are both breaking the rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝It's fine. There are more shadows than there should be... we are both breaking the rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: (2,0)は銃口が床に向くように、設置し直す。
MESSAGE.EN: $(2,1) pointed the gun toward the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: $(2,1) pointed the gun toward the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「じゃ、撃ち方よろしく！」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝I'll leave the shooting to you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝I'll leave the shooting to you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どどどど！
MESSAGE.EN: Rat-tat-tat!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rat-tat-tat!

MESSAGE.JP: 削作業をしているようだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like doing excavation work...
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like doing excavation work...

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: だ粉塵が漂っているが、大きな穴が空いたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Debris was still flying through the air, but it seemed we made a pretty large hole.
MESSAGE.Translation: Debris was still flying through the air, but it seemed we made a pretty large hole.

MESSAGE.JP: からそこへ飛び込んでいくというのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We were going to jump down to the next floor from there.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were going to jump down to the next floor from there.

MESSAGE.JP: 人がかりでかかってきているのかもわからない敵も一蹴していく。
MESSAGE.EN: Not caring how many enemies were waiting, we charged in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not caring how many enemies were waiting, we charged in.

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どどどど！
MESSAGE.EN: Rat-tat-tat!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rat-tat-tat!

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: り口ができた。
MESSAGE.EN: We'd created an entrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: We'd created an entrance.

MESSAGE.JP: たりで飛び降りる。
MESSAGE.EN: Both of us jumped in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both of us jumped in.

MESSAGE.JP: 赦のない一方的な殺戮。
MESSAGE.EN: A merciless one way slaughter.
MESSAGE.Translation: A merciless one way slaughter.

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どどどど！
MESSAGE.EN: Rat-tat-tat!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rat-tat-tat!

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 地下何階ぐらいだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered how far down we were...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered how far down we were...

MESSAGE.JP: ろそろ機械的に撃てるようになってきた。慈悲も何もない。
MESSAGE.EN: My shooting had become mechanical. I felt nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: My shooting had become mechanical. I felt nothing.

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どどどど！
MESSAGE.EN: Rat-tat-tat!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rat-tat-tat!

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いはい、いきましょう。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes yes, let's go.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes yes, let's go.

MESSAGE.JP: いはい、どいてくださいね。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes yes, please move aside.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes yes, please move aside.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の声を聞いてようやく緊張が解ける。床に腰を下ろした。
MESSAGE.EN: I finally relaxed after hearing that, and sat down on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally relaxed after hearing that, and sat down on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 張が続いたためか、肩が強ばっている。首を回してぼきぼきと音を鳴らした。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps it was due to the prolonged stress, but my shoulders were stiff, and my neck made a creaking sound when I tried to turn it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps it was due to the prolonged stress, but my shoulders were stiff, and my neck made a creaking sound when I tried to turn it.

MESSAGE.JP: らは一言も話をせず、体力の回復を待った。
MESSAGE.EN: We waited for our strength to recover, without saying a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: We waited for our strength to recover, without saying a word.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「あたしを見てどうも思わないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝How do you feel when you look at me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝How do you feel when you look at me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうって…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you mean by ❛how❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you mean by ❛how❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「じゃ、そろそろいこうかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Well, shall we go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Well, shall we go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女は質問には答えず、腰を持ち上げて、お尻を払った。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood up without answering the question, and dusted off her skirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood up without answering the question, and dusted off her skirt.

MESSAGE.JP: 女は居心地悪そうに立ったままでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was still standing uncomfortably.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was still standing uncomfortably.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　休まないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Are you not resting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Are you not resting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「もちろん、休むわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Of course I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Of course I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、座ったら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then won't you sit down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then won't you sit down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「ええと、その際にね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Uhmm, that is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Uhmm, that is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「長い戦いになるだろうし、今のうちに食事もしといたほうがいいかなぁって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝It'll probably be a long battle, so I was thinking maybe it's better to eat now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝It'll probably be a long battle, so I was thinking maybe it's better to eat now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そう？　結構あっという間にここまで来た印象だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really? I got the impression that we got here pretty fast.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really? I got the impression that we got here pretty fast.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「あー、そうね、突貫工事みたいにね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Yeah, I guess we did rush through the whole thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Yeah, I guess we did rush through the whole thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「先は長いの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are we still a long way off?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are we still a long way off?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「いやぁ…そんなに長くない…かな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝No... Almost there... I think...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝No... Almost there... I think...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like nothing more than a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: や、こんな深い地下迷宮が学校の下なんかに存在するんだ。タイムマシンだって、なんだって、ありえそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But given how deep this underground maze was, there had to be something at the bottom. Anything was possible, even a time machine.
MESSAGE.Translation: But given how deep this underground maze was, there had to be something at the bottom. Anything was possible, even a time machine.

MESSAGE.JP: 削作業を再開する。
MESSAGE.EN: We resumed our excavation work.
MESSAGE.Translation: We resumed our excavation work.

MESSAGE.JP: らは一言も話をせず、体力の回復を待った。
MESSAGE.EN: We waited for our strength to recover in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: We waited for our strength to recover in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「うんこ、ぶりぶりぶりー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Takin' a shit!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Takin' a shit!❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言いながら彼女が腰を持ち上げて、お尻を払った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said and stood up, brushing her dress.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said and stood up, brushing her dress.

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「じゃ、そろそろいこうかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Shall we go soon?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Shall we go soon?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと、今のは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-wait, what was that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-wait, what was that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今、ぶりぶりーって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just now, you said...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just now, you said...❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「ああ。美少女はそういうことしないって思われてるんじゃないかと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Ah, just wondered if you thought that girls don't do stuff like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Ah, just wondered if you thought that girls don't do stuff like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、思ってないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah no, I don't think that, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah no, I don't think that, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「ならいいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝That's fine then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝That's fine then.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どどどど！
MESSAGE.EN: Rat-tat-tat!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rat-tat-tat!

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どどどど！
MESSAGE.EN: Rat-tat-tat!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rat-tat-tat!

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Open fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どどどど！
MESSAGE.EN: Rat-tat-tat!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rat-tat-tat!

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Cease fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: なる命令は発せられなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't give any further commands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't give any further commands.

MESSAGE.JP: の数え方が合っていたら、今は７階で穴は８階に続いているはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If I'm counting correctly, we are now blasting our way from the 7th floor to the 8th.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I'm counting correctly, we are now blasting our way from the 7th floor to the 8th.

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Under here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Under here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女はそう告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She told me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She told me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ？　この下が最下層なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? The floor below this is the last one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? The floor below this is the last one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「いいえ。最下層は６０階」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝No, the bottom floor is the 60th.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝No, the bottom floor is the 60th.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝60 floors!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝60 floors!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「壊れたエレベーターで確認しただけだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝I confirmed that at the broken elevator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝I confirmed that at the broken elevator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「そんなに青ざめなくていいわよ。もしこの次の階よりもさらに、迷宮が広がっていようと、もう関係ないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝You don't have to turn so pale. Even if the floor below has a larger maze, we don't have to deal with it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝You don't have to turn so pale. Even if the floor below has a larger maze, we don't have to deal with it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「ここが、奴との最終決戦の場なのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝This will be the final battle with him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝This will be the final battle with him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「奴って？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝❛Him❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝❛Him❜?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝The last boss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝The last boss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「闇の執行部の…幹部？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The leader of the Darkness Executives？❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The leader of the Darkness Executives？❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「そう。時風瞬。とことん意地が悪い、部長様よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝That's right. Shun Tokikaze. A thoroughly evil person. He's their leader.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝That's right. Shun Tokikaze. A thoroughly evil person. He's their leader.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「強いんでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't he strong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't he strong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「そりゃもう。奴はこの世界最強よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Of course. He's the strongest in this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Of course. He's the strongest in this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、こっちもこの最終兵器があるよ。こいつだったら勝てるよ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But we also have an ultimate weapon here, if it's this guy, we can win for sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But we also have an ultimate weapon here, if it's this guy, we can win for sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こまでこの機関銃ひとつでやってきたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We managed to make it all the way here with this machine gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: We managed to make it all the way here with this machine gun.

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「物量でのごり押しなら最強だけど、敵が単身なら隙をついて懐に入られて逆に不利よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝It's very effective against large numbers of enemies, but one-on-one you're actually at a disadvantage if your enemy comes charging at you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝It's very effective against large numbers of enemies, but one-on-one you're actually at a disadvantage if your enemy comes charging at you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「それに相手が相手だしねぇ…真っ向から攻めても相打ちすら叶わないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝And we're up against a formidable opponent this time... if we go head to head, we can't even hope for a draw.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝And we're up against a formidable opponent this time... if we go head to head, we can't even hope for a draw.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、どうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, what shall we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, what shall we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「それを考えるのがあなたの仕事でしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝It's your job to think about that, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝It's your job to think about that, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええ、そうなの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? For real!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? For real!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「そうよ。なんのためにあなたを連れてきたと思ってんのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝That's right. Why do you think I brought you along?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝That's right. Why do you think I brought you along?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええー、ちょっと待ってよ、何も聞いてないし、そんな簡単に引き受けられないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh, wait a second, I didn't hear about this, so I can't simply accept that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh, wait a second, I didn't hear about this, so I can't simply accept that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「なっさけない男ねぇ…幻滅だわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Such a pathetic man... I am disillusioned.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Such a pathetic man... I am disillusioned.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えぇ？　最近知り合ったばかりなのに、いつのまに評価が上がってたんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh? We've only known each other for a while. Just what did I do to make you think so highly of me...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh? We've only known each other for a while. Just what did I do to make you think so highly of me...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなこと一方的に言われても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if you tell me that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if you tell me that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「じゃあ、あなたは囮よ、とっとと先陣きっていきなさいよっ、先陣きっちゃいなさいよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝Then you'll be the decoy. Hurry up and take the vanguard. Just take the vanguard already!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝Then you'll be the decoy. Hurry up and take the vanguard. Just take the vanguard already!❞

MESSAGE.JP: すどす、とお尻を蹴られる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was kicked in the butt.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was kicked in the butt.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなっ、殺されますからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'd get killed if I do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'd get killed if I do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「あなたなら死なないわよ、とっとといきなさいよっ、囮になっちゃいなさいよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝You won't die, just go already, become a decoy already!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝You won't die, just go already, become a decoy already!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕、単なる一般人ですからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I am simply a normal person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I am simply a normal person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: $(1,0)@「だからじゃないっ、なんならあたしが殺してさしあげましょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `$(1,1)@ ❝What, do you want me to kill you right now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `$(1,1)@ ❝What, do you want me to kill you right now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: わい…この子、本気だ！
MESSAGE.EN: Scary... She was serious!
MESSAGE.Translation: Scary... She was serious!

MESSAGE.JP: 方なく、最後の階層へ僕は飛び降りる。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have a choice. I jumped down to the last floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have a choice. I jumped down to the last floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を上げて戦意のないことをアピールしつつひとり奧へ歩いていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: I raised both my arms, showing no signs of aggression, and moved deeper in...
MESSAGE.Translation: I raised both my arms, showing no signs of aggression, and moved deeper in...

MESSAGE.JP: こまで続くのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: How far does this continue...?
MESSAGE.Translation: How far does this continue...?

MESSAGE.JP: 安になってきて、僕は壁を探す。
MESSAGE.EN: I became uneasy and searched for the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: I became uneasy and searched for the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: った。それに沿って歩いていけば、戻ってもこれるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I found it. If I followed it, I should be able to come back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found it. If I followed it, I should be able to come back.

MESSAGE.JP: つになっても、誰も現れないし、通路も終わらない。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how long I walked, I saw no one, and the path continued endlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how long I walked, I saw no one, and the path continued endlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: 分と歩いてきたはずなのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been walking for quite a while...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been walking for quite a while...

MESSAGE.JP: は不安になって、引き返すことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I became uneasy, and decided to turn back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I became uneasy, and decided to turn back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（相当な距離歩いたな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I've walk quite the distance...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I've walk quite the distance...)

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と壁に突き当たった。
MESSAGE.EN: *Thud*, I bumped into the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thud*, I bumped into the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: くような声で呼んでみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to call out in a small voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to call out in a small voice.

MESSAGE.JP: ってくる声はない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was only silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was only silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「朱鷺戸さぁん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tokido-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tokido-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「沙耶ぁ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Saya!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saya!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 度は大きな声で。
MESSAGE.EN: This time, louder.
MESSAGE.Translation: This time, louder.

MESSAGE.JP: けさが続くだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The silence continued.
MESSAGE.Translation: The silence continued.

MESSAGE.JP: イトを点け、僕はその階を散策してみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the light and walked toward the stair.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the light and walked toward the stair.

MESSAGE.JP: の気配がしない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no human presence.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no human presence.

MESSAGE.JP: (2,0)はどこにいった？
MESSAGE.EN: Just where was $(2,1)?
MESSAGE.Translation: Just where was $(2,1)?

MESSAGE.JP: まさか、僕が囮だと見抜かれていた、とか…。
MESSAGE.EN: It couldn't be... maybe he knew that I was the decoy...
MESSAGE.Translation: It couldn't be... maybe he knew that I was the decoy...

MESSAGE.JP: の知らないところで$(2,0)は敵に捕まり、連れ去られた後だったり…。
MESSAGE.EN: $(2,1) had been caught by the enemy, and taken away...
MESSAGE.Translation: $(2,1) had been caught by the enemy, and taken away...

MESSAGE.JP: も、もしそうだとして、僕に何ができる？
MESSAGE.EN: But even if that happened, what could I do?
MESSAGE.Translation: But even if that happened, what could I do?

MESSAGE.JP: 讐？　敵討ち？　とんでもない。
MESSAGE.EN: Retaliate? Revenge? That sounded impossible.
MESSAGE.Translation: Retaliate? Revenge? That sounded impossible.

MESSAGE.JP: は強引に巻き込まれただけの一般人じゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Was I not just a normal person that got tangled up in all this?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was I not just a normal person that got tangled up in all this?

MESSAGE.JP: んな日常ともおさらばできるなら、それに越したことはない。
MESSAGE.EN: If I could say goodbye to this daily life, that would be all the better.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I could say goodbye to this daily life, that would be all the better.

MESSAGE.JP: は何も見ていないし、知らない。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't seen anything and had nothing to do with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't seen anything and had nothing to do with it.

MESSAGE.JP: ういうことにして、帰って寝ればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: I just had to accept that, go home, and head to bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just had to accept that, go home, and head to bed.

MESSAGE.JP: ん、そうだ、そうだ、と僕の中の僕も僕を納得させにかかっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, that's right. My inner self convinced me to accept that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, that's right. My inner self convinced me to accept that.

MESSAGE.JP: その通りだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's exactly right.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's exactly right.

MESSAGE.JP: 長居は無用だ。戻ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no point in staying. Let's go back.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no point in staying. Let's go back.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そりゃあ、切り札を出すしかないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Then, I have no choice but to use my trump card.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Then, I have no choice but to use my trump card.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さすが、ちゃんと準備してきてるんだ。この機関銃よりすごいものなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I knew you would be prepared. Do you have something greater than this machine gun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I knew you would be prepared. Do you have something greater than this machine gun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「一部には断然すごいという人たちもいるかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Some may say he's in a league of his own.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Some may say he's in a league of his own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「じゃ、いきましょうか。マイパートナー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Shall we go then, my partner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Shall we go then, my partner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: っし、と両肩をつかまれる。
MESSAGE.EN: My shoulder was suddenly grasped.
MESSAGE.Translation: My shoulder was suddenly grasped.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あたしの切り札は、理樹くん。あなたなのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝My trump card is you. Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝My trump card is you. Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 間をかけて準備を済ませた。
MESSAGE.EN: It took some time to finish preparing.
MESSAGE.Translation: It took some time to finish preparing.

MESSAGE.JP: ざ最後の階層へ舞い降りる。
MESSAGE.EN: At last, I descended to the lowest floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: At last, I descended to the lowest floor.

MESSAGE.JP: の気配はない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no human presence there.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no human presence there.

MESSAGE.JP: はいつでも撃てるように、両手で握っている。緊張のあまり汗でべったりだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I held my gun with both hands, ready to shoot as normal. They were sticky with sweat because of the tension.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held my gun with both hands, ready to shoot as normal. They were sticky with sweat because of the tension.

MESSAGE.JP: の階は完全な暗闇ではなかった。わずかな光源がある。
MESSAGE.EN: This floor was not completely dark. There was a faint light.
MESSAGE.Translation: This floor was not completely dark. There was a faint light.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、沙耶が言っていた故障したエレベーターのランプなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the light of the broken elevator that Saya spoke of.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the light of the broken elevator that Saya spoke of.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらくすると目が慣れてきて、ぼんやりと壁が浮かび上がってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: After some time, my eyes adjusted to the darkness and I could vaguely see the walls.
MESSAGE.Translation: After some time, my eyes adjusted to the darkness and I could vaguely see the walls.

MESSAGE.JP: かし…
MESSAGE.EN: However...
MESSAGE.Translation: However...

MESSAGE.JP: 自分の体を見下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I looked down at my body.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I looked down at my body.

MESSAGE.JP: んでもないことになっている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Something unbelievable happened...
MESSAGE.Translation: Something unbelievable happened...

MESSAGE.JP: 装なんて…まるでそんな趣味でもありそうじゃないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was dressed like a girl... It was almost like I was into that stuff...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was dressed like a girl... It was almost like I was into that stuff...

MESSAGE.JP: もそも童顔なのを気にしてるぐらいなのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: I always had a complex about my baby face...
MESSAGE.Translation: I always had a complex about my baby face...

MESSAGE.JP: かに見つかろうものなら、死にたくなるぐらい恥ずかしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: If someone had seen me right then, I'd have died of embarrassment...
MESSAGE.Translation: If someone had seen me right then, I'd have died of embarrassment...

MESSAGE.JP: やいや…
MESSAGE.EN: No no, wait...
MESSAGE.Translation: No no, wait...

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことは忘れろ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I needed to forget this.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I needed to forget this.

MESSAGE.JP: にかく、今は自分の任務を全うしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I needed to complete my duty.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I needed to complete my duty.

MESSAGE.JP: 進もう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I decided to proceed.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I decided to proceed.

MESSAGE.JP: 歩、二歩、三歩…。
MESSAGE.EN: One step, two steps, three steps...
MESSAGE.Translation: One step, two steps, three steps...

MESSAGE.JP: を凝らして、慎重に歩みを進める。
MESSAGE.EN: I stared ahead, carefully advancing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stared ahead, carefully advancing.

MESSAGE.JP: 数は二十を超える。
MESSAGE.EN: After I took no more than twenty steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I took no more than twenty steps.

MESSAGE.JP: いつは突然現れた。
MESSAGE.EN: He suddenly appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: He suddenly appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: が見えた時には、銃口を突きつけられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The moment I saw his foot, I was already held at gun point.
MESSAGE.Translation: The moment I saw his foot, I was already held at gun point.

MESSAGE.JP: は構えてさえいない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't let myself be captured.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't let myself be captured.

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「ジ・エンドだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝It's the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝It's the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「と言いたいところだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Is what I'd like to say, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Is what I'd like to say, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「こんな茶番に付き合わされるとはな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝I can't believe I have to play along with this farce.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝I can't believe I have to play along with this farce.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「仲間に女装までさせて、しかもウィッグでシルエットまで同じにしてくるなんて…ナンセンスにもほどがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Making her comrade put on women's clothing and even a wig to make the silhouette look similar... This couldn't get any more ridiculous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Making her comrade put on women's clothing and even a wig to make the silhouette look similar... This couldn't get any more ridiculous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「こんなものに引っかかるとでも思ったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Did she think I'd fall for this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Did she think I'd fall for this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「出てこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Come out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Come out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 闇の中、男の冷ややかな声が響く。
MESSAGE.EN: The man's cold voice reverberated in the darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man's cold voice reverberated in the darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: の後方、５メートルぐらいの辺りに、その『気配』が今現れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Behind me, about five meters away, her ❛presence❜ appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: Behind me, about five meters away, her ❛presence❜ appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなたの負けよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You've lost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You've lost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 耶の声。その言葉に僕は驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: Saya's voice. Her words resonated with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saya's voice. Her words resonated with me.

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「なぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: さに、どうして？
MESSAGE.EN: That's right, why?
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right, why?

MESSAGE.JP: 耶と僕が入れ替わり、僕が囮になって、敵をおびき寄せる…その作戦はみごとに看破されたじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Our plan was to switch places and use me as a bait to bring out the enemy... but the whole thing blew up in our faces.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our plan was to switch places and use me as a bait to bring out the enemy... but the whole thing blew up in our faces.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなたの銃は理樹くんに向いてる。その真後ろにあたしは立ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You are pointing your gun at Riki-kun. I'm standing right behind him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You are pointing your gun at Riki-kun. I'm standing right behind him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「理樹くんが邪魔で、あたしを撃てない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You can't shoot me since Riki-kun is in the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You can't shoot me since Riki-kun is in the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「角度を変えても、あたしは常に対角線上に動く。それぐらいの反射神経は持ってるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If you try to find another angle around him, I can always move to keep him between us. My reflexes are that good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If you try to find another angle around him, I can always move to keep him between us. My reflexes are that good.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「つまり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝In other words...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝In other words...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「仲間を囮にするのではなく、盾にしたのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝You are not using your comrade as a bait, but as a shield.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝You are not using your comrade as a bait, but as a shield.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ええ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とも簡単に認めた…。
MESSAGE.EN: She admitted it so easily...
MESSAGE.Translation: She admitted it so easily...

MESSAGE.JP: をだますなら、味方から。それを実践されてしまったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If you wanted to deceive your enemy, you had to first deceive your allies. She was really putting that into practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you wanted to deceive your enemy, you had to first deceive your allies. She was really putting that into practice.

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「どうして、俺が撃てないと思う？　敵のパートナーを？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Why do you think I can't shoot my enemy's partner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Why do you think I can't shoot my enemy's partner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「いろいろな状況を鑑みてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I thought about it quite a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I thought about it quite a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなたは撃てないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You can't shoot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You can't shoot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「じゃあ、撃とう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝I'll show you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝I'll show you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: でははっきりと見える。銃のグリップを持つ手に力が入った。
MESSAGE.EN: I can see it clearly now. He's putting strength into the arm holding the gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can see it clearly now. He's putting strength into the arm holding the gun.

MESSAGE.JP: そぅ…どうとでもなれ、だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Damn... I can't do anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Damn... I can't do anything.

MESSAGE.JP: は目を閉じた。
MESSAGE.EN: I closed my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I closed my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「理樹くん、目を開いて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, open your eyes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, open your eyes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「この拮抗状態を崩せるのは、あなたしかいないのよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Only you can break this deadlock.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Only you can break this deadlock.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「相手だって、あたしと同じようにあなたを中心とした対角線に逃げるはず」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝The opponent, just like me, is trying to run diagonally with you at the center❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝The opponent, just like me, is trying to run diagonally with you at the center❞

MESSAGE.JP: こいつも沙耶並みの反射神経を持ち、どう動こうが僕を中心にぐるぐる回るだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: His reflexes were on par with Saya's, but he had no choice but to move with me in the center.
MESSAGE.Translation: His reflexes were on par with Saya's, but he had no choice but to move with me in the center.

MESSAGE.JP: れはふたりの体力が続く限り、半永久的に続く。
MESSAGE.EN: As long as those two remained on even footing, this would continue.
MESSAGE.Translation: As long as those two remained on even footing, this would continue.

MESSAGE.JP: まり。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words.

MESSAGE.JP: 心にいる僕だけが、その拮抗を崩せるチャンスがある。
MESSAGE.EN: Only I, who was in the middle, had a chance to break the deadlock.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only I, who was in the middle, had a chance to break the deadlock.

MESSAGE.JP: が…
MESSAGE.EN: I should...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should...

MESSAGE.JP: てばいいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: shoot.
MESSAGE.Translation: shoot.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「理樹くん、勝つのはあたしじゃないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, This isn't my victory.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, This isn't my victory.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あたしたち、よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's ours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's ours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: い返せば、僕が彼女のパートナーとして役立ったことなんてあっただろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking back, when had I been any help to her as her partner?
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking back, when had I been any help to her as her partner?

MESSAGE.JP: も、今なら…
MESSAGE.EN: But now...
MESSAGE.Translation: But now...

MESSAGE.JP: 弱な僕でも…
MESSAGE.EN: Even the weak me...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even the weak me...

MESSAGE.JP: リガーを引くという勇気さえ振り絞れば…
MESSAGE.EN: If I mustered the courage to pull the trigger...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I mustered the courage to pull the trigger...

MESSAGE.JP: の首領を倒すという、最高の手柄をあげることができるんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I would defeat the top boss, and get the highest achievement...
MESSAGE.Translation: I would defeat the top boss, and get the highest achievement...

MESSAGE.JP: も、この人は…影じゃない…。
MESSAGE.EN: But this person... was not a shadow...
MESSAGE.Translation: But this person... was not a shadow...

MESSAGE.JP: は仮面でわからないけど…手は生身だ。だったら、本体なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't see his face, but... he was the real thing. He was a living person.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't see his face, but... he was the real thing. He was a living person.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「右肩を狙いなさい、銃を封じさえすればいいのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Aim for his right shoulder. It's enough if he can't use a gun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Aim for his right shoulder. It's enough if he can't use a gun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の心が読めているのか、そんなアドバイスが後ろから飛んできた。
MESSAGE.EN: As though she had read my heart, her advice came flying from behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: As though she had read my heart, her advice came flying from behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: は決心をする。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided.

MESSAGE.JP: 気を振り絞って、銃を持ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I mustered up my courage and brought up the gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I mustered up my courage and brought up the gun.

MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手は微動だにせず、銃口は僕の胸に向いたままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The enemy didn't stop, but kept aiming his gun at my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: The enemy didn't stop, but kept aiming his gun at my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: つだって、僕を撃ち殺せるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He could kill me at any time.
MESSAGE.Translation: He could kill me at any time.

MESSAGE.JP: うして、沙耶はそれができない、と知ったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Why did Saya think that he couldn't do that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did Saya think that he couldn't do that?

MESSAGE.JP: 際、こうして、僕が指さえ引けば、相手を撃てる位置まで銃口を持ってこられた。
MESSAGE.EN: Sure enough, I managed to raise my gun enough that I could shoot any moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sure enough, I managed to raise my gun enough that I could shoot any moment.

MESSAGE.JP: いは右肩。
MESSAGE.EN: I aimed at his right shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I aimed at his right shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: は、指を引くだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: All I had to do was pull the trigger.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I had to do was pull the trigger.

MESSAGE.JP: 引こう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Let's do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Let's do it.

MESSAGE.JP: だだん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bang bang bang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bang bang bang*!

MESSAGE.JP: けざまにみっつの音が連なって鳴り響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Three sounds were released, echoing off one another.
MESSAGE.Translation: Three sounds were released, echoing off one another.

MESSAGE.JP: は一発しか撃っていない。
MESSAGE.EN: I only shot once.
MESSAGE.Translation: I only shot once.

MESSAGE.JP: いうことは、三人がほぼ同時に撃ったんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: So that means those two both shot at the same time...
MESSAGE.Translation: So that means those two both shot at the same time...

MESSAGE.JP: うなったんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: What happened...
MESSAGE.Translation: What happened...

MESSAGE.JP: 果を知りたい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I want to know...
MESSAGE.Translation: I want to know...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「沙耶っ、どうなったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Saya, what happened...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saya, what happened...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声がしない!?
MESSAGE.EN: ...She didn't respond!?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She didn't respond!?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「沙耶っ、沙耶！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Saya, Saya!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saya, Saya!❞

MESSAGE.JP: う暗闇に呼び続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept calling in the darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept calling in the darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「沙耶ぁ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Saya!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saya!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「…大丈夫よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝...I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ先の床から声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: The voice came from the floor ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: The voice came from the floor ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「撃たれたの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Were you shot!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Were you shot!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「かすり傷程度よ、なんでもないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's just a scratch, nothing to worry about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's just a scratch, nothing to worry about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも倒れるぐらいって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you collapsed on the floor...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you collapsed on the floor...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「自分から床に倒れ込んだのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I just fell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I just fell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりで立ち上がれたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was able to stand up by herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was able to stand up by herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほんとになんともない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you really alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you really alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「大丈夫だってば。相棒を信じなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I said I'm fine. Believe in your partner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I said I'm fine. Believe in your partner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ…敵は…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then... the enemy...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then... the enemy...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「左右の肩を撃たれて、そこにうずくまってるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝He was shot in both shoulders and is crouching over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝He was shot in both shoulders and is crouching over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは…死なないの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is he going to die...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is he going to die...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「死なないわよ、安心なさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝He won't die, don't worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝He won't die, don't worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐそばまできたのがわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could tell she walked right up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could tell she walked right up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「理樹くんは、大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, are you alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, are you alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, aah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, aah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: われて初めて僕は自分も怪我をしていることに気づいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Only when I was asked did I realize that I was also injured.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only when I was asked did I realize that I was also injured.

MESSAGE.JP: の二の腕あたりが、じんと痛い。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt pain around my left upper arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt pain around my left upper arm.

MESSAGE.JP: って確かめてみる。傷口は深くはない。
MESSAGE.EN: I checked the wound by touching it. It wasn't deep.
MESSAGE.Translation: I checked the wound by touching it. It wasn't deep.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こっちもかすり傷程度だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was just grazed, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was just grazed, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そう、よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I see, that's good to hear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I see, that's good to hear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「理樹くん…頑張ったわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun... You did great.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun... You did great.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そうだね…僕にしてはね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝T-that's right... not bad for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝T-that's right... not bad for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「普通の男の子でもなかなかできることじゃないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's something a normal boy can't really do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's something a normal boy can't really do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「立派よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It was wonderful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It was wonderful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はは、ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haha, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haha, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は、その存在を確認するように、沙耶の頭や肩に触れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I touched Saya's head and shoulder, checking left and right.
MESSAGE.Translation: I touched Saya's head and shoulder, checking left and right.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「この先はどうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do we do now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do we do now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「奧に稼働しているエレベーターがある…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝There's an elevator going deeper inside...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝There's an elevator going deeper inside...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 対方向から声が返ってきて僕は驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: I was surprised at the voice from the other direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was surprised at the voice from the other direction.

MESSAGE.JP: れてる時風の声だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the voice of the fallen Tokikaze.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the voice of the fallen Tokikaze.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「それはどうもありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「待ってよ、罠かもしれないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, it could be a trap.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, it could be a trap.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「大丈夫よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしてそんな信頼できるの？　さっきまで戦ってた相手だよ？　沙耶も傷つけられたんだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you so certain? He was fighting with you a few seconds ago, you know? You got hurt, didn't you, Saya?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you so certain? He was fighting with you a few seconds ago, you know? You got hurt, didn't you, Saya?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「…安心しろ、坊主」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝...Don't worry, boy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝...Don't worry, boy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつは僕に話しかけているようだ。坊主とは僕のことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He seemed to be talking to me. There wasn't anyone else whom could be called ❛boy❜ here.
MESSAGE.Translation: He seemed to be talking to me. There wasn't anyone else whom could be called ❛boy❜ here.

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「そいつは、秘宝を得る権利を勝ち取ったんだ。もう、罠も仕掛けもねぇよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝This person has already earned the right to take the treasure. There won't be any more traps...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝This person has already earned the right to take the treasure. There won't be any more traps...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「権利ってのは…あなたを倒すことだったんですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The right to... Was the condition defeating you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The right to... Was the condition defeating you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「…そうだ。少なくとも俺とそいつの中ではな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝It was. At least between us two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝It was. At least between us two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだろう…僕の知らないところで、取り決めてあったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What was that... could it be they had negotiated something when I wasn't there?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was that... could it be they had negotiated something when I wasn't there?

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そういうことよ、理樹くん。信じていいわ。いきましょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝He's telling the truth, Riki-kun. We can believe him. Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝He's telling the truth, Riki-kun. We can believe him. Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女が先に立って、先が見えない僕の――彼女自身のものである――服の袖を引っ張る。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood up, and pulled on my (technically, her) sleeve, as I couldn't see ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood up, and pulled on my (technically, her) sleeve, as I couldn't see ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: はそれを頼りに、歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I was led along by her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was led along by her.

MESSAGE.JP: う、ライトを点けてもいいのだろうけど、時風の容体を確認したくなかった。見てしまったら、後悔してしまいそうだから…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was probably all right to turn on the light, but I didn't want to see Tokikaze. If I saw the state he was in, I might have had regrets.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was probably all right to turn on the light, but I didn't want to see Tokikaze. If I saw the state he was in, I might have had regrets.

MESSAGE.JP: 闇の中、もうひとつのエレベーターの明かりを目指した。
MESSAGE.EN: In the darkness, only the elevator's light showed the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the darkness, only the elevator's light showed the way.

MESSAGE.JP: 働しているエレベーターの前に辿りつく。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived at the working elevator.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived at the working elevator.

MESSAGE.JP: の姿が滑稽すぎたので、暗闇の中、もう一度服を交換し合った。
MESSAGE.EN: Since my appearance was too funny, I changed clothes again in the darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since my appearance was too funny, I changed clothes again in the darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: 替えを終え、エレベーターに乗り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Once I was done changing, I stepped into the elevator.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once I was done changing, I stepped into the elevator.

MESSAGE.JP: ぃぃぃーーん、と音を立てて、深く深く下降していく。
MESSAGE.EN: *Brrrhhh*. It whirred as it descended deep, deep down.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Brrrhhh*. It whirred as it descended deep, deep down.

MESSAGE.JP: 構な速度なのか、体が浮いているような感覚にとらわれる。
MESSAGE.EN: The acceleration must have been quite high, since I could feel my body being lifted up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The acceleration must have been quite high, since I could feel my body being lifted up.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でもさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's odd.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's odd.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「最下層が６０階だなんて…一体誰がこんなものを作ろうなんて考えたのやら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It goes 60 floors down... Who in the world thought of building this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It goes 60 floors down... Who in the world thought of building this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「まあ、当時はエレベーターすらなかったんでしょうから、随分マシよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well originally, there wasn't an elevator, so this is much better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well originally, there wasn't an elevator, so this is much better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なかったら、オカシイよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way there wasn't one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way there wasn't one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「でも、それに相応しい秘宝ということよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That shows just how important the treasure must have been.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That shows just how important the treasure must have been.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さて、なんだろうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I wonder what it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I wonder what it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: らに下、その底へ向けて、僕らは潜っていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: We continued to descend, toward the bottom...
MESSAGE.Translation: We continued to descend, toward the bottom...

MESSAGE.JP: うやくエレベーターが止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: The elevator finally came to a stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: The elevator finally came to a stop.

MESSAGE.JP: まいがした。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt dizzy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt dizzy.

MESSAGE.JP: き気を催す。それぐらいの長旅だった。
MESSAGE.EN: My stomach was churning. It was such a long ride.
MESSAGE.Translation: My stomach was churning. It was such a long ride.

MESSAGE.JP: アがゆっくり開く。
MESSAGE.EN: The door opened slowly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door opened slowly.

MESSAGE.JP: こも暗闇だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was pitch black here as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was pitch black here as well.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐその先へ彼女は進もうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Saya immediately strode forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saya immediately strode forward.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、そんな簡単に入っていいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, can we enter so easily?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, can we enter so easily?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「言ってたでしょ、もう罠も仕掛けもないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Didn't I say so? There won't be any more traps.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Didn't I say so? There won't be any more traps.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、ライト点けてもいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, can we turn on the light?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, can we turn on the light?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そうね。いいわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That's right. Let's do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That's right. Let's do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: イトを点けると、意外にも小さな空間だということがわかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Once the light was on, the space turned out to be unexpectedly small.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once the light was on, the space turned out to be unexpectedly small.

MESSAGE.JP: の空間自体が部屋であり、そしてその端にはガラス張りのさらに小さな部屋が備え付けられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: This space itself was a room, and further in there was another room enclosed in glass.
MESSAGE.Translation: This space itself was a room, and further in there was another room enclosed in glass.

MESSAGE.JP: れ以外に何もない、ということは秘宝はその中にあるということだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nothing else, so the treasure must be in here.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nothing else, so the treasure must be in here.

MESSAGE.JP: んとなく連想していたのは、秘宝を崇め奉るようなもっと宗教的な風景だった。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason, I had thought that the space where the treasure was housed would be more religious in nature.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason, I had thought that the space where the treasure was housed would be more religious in nature.

MESSAGE.JP: 際はまるで素っ気ない病院の一角のような部屋だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Instead it looked not unlike an ordinary hospital room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Instead it looked not unlike an ordinary hospital room.

MESSAGE.JP: 女は迷いのない足取りで、ガラス張りの部屋を目指していた。
MESSAGE.EN: She walked toward the glass room without any hesitation.
MESSAGE.Translation: She walked toward the glass room without any hesitation.

MESSAGE.JP: も慌ててその後に続く。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly followed behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly followed behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どう？　わかる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well? Did you figure out anything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well? Did you figure out anything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ラスに張りついたその背中に問いかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked her, who was clinging to the glass window pane.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked her, who was clinging to the glass window pane.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「この中に入らない限りわからないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I can't tell unless we go inside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I can't tell unless we go inside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こは、科学の実験室のような部屋だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The room looked as though it was used for conducting scientific experiments.
MESSAGE.Translation: The room looked as though it was used for conducting scientific experiments.

MESSAGE.JP: ラスコや試験管、管がたくさん繋がれた機械、モニターなど、所狭しと詰めてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was stuffed with flasks, monitors and pieces of equipment connected by countless tubes.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was stuffed with flasks, monitors and pieces of equipment connected by countless tubes.

MESSAGE.JP: が入る隙間は、ひとりぶんぐらいしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was only enough space for one person to enter.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was only enough space for one person to enter.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あたしが入るわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I will go in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I will go in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は深く考えもせず、頷いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded without giving it much thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded without giving it much thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 然僕なんかより、彼女が入るべきだと思ったからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Obviously, rather than me, she should be the one to enter.
MESSAGE.Translation: Obviously, rather than me, she should be the one to enter.

MESSAGE.JP: り口を開くのは厄介だったらしく、ガラスの向こうに彼女が現れるのは思っていたよりも、ずっと遅かった。
MESSAGE.EN: It took her a while to sneak inside. I saw her through the window much later than I thought I would.
MESSAGE.Translation: It took her a while to sneak inside. I saw her through the window much later than I thought I would.

MESSAGE.JP: ず彼女は大きな機械を調べ始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She started by examining the machinery.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started by examining the machinery.

MESSAGE.JP: タンを押してみたりする。
MESSAGE.EN: She tried pressing the buttons.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tried pressing the buttons.

MESSAGE.JP: かが作動して、彼女を危機的な状況に陥れるのではないか。僕ははらはらする。
MESSAGE.EN: If something moved, wouldn't that be dangerous? My heart kept pounding.
MESSAGE.Translation: If something moved, wouldn't that be dangerous? My heart kept pounding.

MESSAGE.JP: 局、何も作動しなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, nothing happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, nothing happened.

MESSAGE.JP: らゆるランプに光が灯らない。通電していないのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even the lamp didn't turn on. There was no electricity.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even the lamp didn't turn on. There was no electricity.

MESSAGE.JP: 女はやれやれ、というジェスチャーをした。
MESSAGE.EN: She made a disappointed gesture.
MESSAGE.Translation: She made a disappointed gesture.

MESSAGE.JP: に彼女は奧に設置してある横置きの冷蔵庫のようなものを調べにかかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She then moved to investigate the horizontally placed refrigerator in the back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then moved to investigate the horizontally placed refrigerator in the back.

MESSAGE.JP: そうな蓋はいとも簡単に開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She easily opened the heavy-looking door.
MESSAGE.Translation: She easily opened the heavy-looking door.

MESSAGE.JP: こからは中身は見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't see the contents from here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't see the contents from here.

MESSAGE.JP: う少しガラスが大きかったらよかったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd been better if the glass were a bit bigger.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd been better if the glass were a bit bigger.

MESSAGE.JP: 女はこちらにお尻を向けて、もぞもぞと腕を動かし続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned her back to me, and continued reaching about with her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned her back to me, and continued reaching about with her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: るで物取りだ。
MESSAGE.EN: As if she were a thief.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if she were a thief.

MESSAGE.JP: 際やっていることは盗掘か。
MESSAGE.EN: In fact, what we're doing could be called looting.
MESSAGE.Translation: In fact, what we're doing could be called looting.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらくして、彼女はようやく上体を持ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: After a short time, she finally raised her body.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a short time, she finally raised her body.

MESSAGE.JP: して自分の手…その指先をじっと見つめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: And her hands... she kept staring at her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: And her hands... she kept staring at her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: ...What is that?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What is that?

MESSAGE.JP: の先が、血に染まっているように見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked as if they were soaked in blood.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked as if they were soaked in blood.

MESSAGE.JP: 我!?　今負ったのか、それともさっきの戦いで負っていたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: A wound!? Did she just get it, or did she get it from the battle before?
MESSAGE.Translation: A wound!? Did she just get it, or did she get it from the battle before?

MESSAGE.JP: は状況が知りたくて、ガラスを叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I knocked on the glass, wanting to know the situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knocked on the glass, wanting to know the situation.

MESSAGE.JP: んて分厚いんだ。びくともしない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was so thick it didn't budge an inch.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was so thick it didn't budge an inch.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、音は伝わったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, it seemed she heard me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, it seemed she heard me.

MESSAGE.JP: 女が振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: の表情は…いつもの彼女より、大人びて見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: The look on her face... She looked more mature than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: The look on her face... She looked more mature than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: かを慈しむような…そんな微妙な…きっと僕にしかわからない変化。
MESSAGE.EN: She wore a tender expression, but it was so subtle only I could tell the difference.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wore a tender expression, but it was so subtle only I could tell the difference.

MESSAGE.JP: の先を切った、その程度の話ではない。
MESSAGE.EN: It surely wasn't caused by accidentally cutting her fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: It surely wasn't caused by accidentally cutting her fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: 実に、重大な、何かが、彼女の身に起きたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Without doubt, something serious had happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without doubt, something serious had happened.

MESSAGE.JP: らにガラスを叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I pounded on the glass harder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pounded on the glass harder.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしたの!?　何があったの!?　怪我をしたの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong!? What happened!? Did you get hurt!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong!? What happened!? Did you get hurt!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女は首を縦にも横にも振らない。
MESSAGE.EN: She neither nodded nor shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She neither nodded nor shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねぇ、聞こえる!?　返事をしてよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, can you hear me!? Say something!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, can you hear me!? Say something!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 情ひとつ変えず、ガラスに近づいてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her expression remained unchanged as she approached the window pane.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her expression remained unchanged as she approached the window pane.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『聞こえるわ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[I can hear you.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[I can hear you.]

MESSAGE.JP: ぐもった声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a muffled voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a muffled voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『理樹くん、冷静でいてほしいんだけど』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[Riki-kun, I want you to stay calm.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[Riki-kun, I want you to stay calm.]

MESSAGE.JP: んな前振りしないでよ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a bad feeling...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a bad feeling...

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『生物兵器よ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[It's a biological weapon.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[It's a biological weapon.]

MESSAGE.JP: いぶつへいき…。
MESSAGE.EN: A biological weapon...
MESSAGE.Translation: A biological weapon...

MESSAGE.EN: What is...
MESSAGE.Translation: What is...

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『秘宝よ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[That's the secret treasure.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[That's the secret treasure.]

MESSAGE.JP: ほうが…せいぶつへいき…!?
MESSAGE.EN: The treasure is... a biological weapon!?
MESSAGE.Translation: The treasure is... a biological weapon!?

MESSAGE.JP: 味がわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't understand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't understand.

MESSAGE.JP: 女が何を言っているのか。誰か説明してほしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone please explain what she is talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone please explain what she is talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の無事を説明してほしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone please tell me she is alright.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone please tell me she is alright.

MESSAGE.JP: も危険なことなんて起きていないんだと。
MESSAGE.EN: That nothing dangerous could be here.
MESSAGE.Translation: That nothing dangerous could be here.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『致命的ね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[It's lethal.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[It's lethal.]

MESSAGE.JP: めいてき…
MESSAGE.EN: Lethal...
MESSAGE.Translation: Lethal...

MESSAGE.JP: の命が…ちめいてきなの…
MESSAGE.EN: Lethal... to whom?
MESSAGE.Translation: Lethal... to whom?

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『ここでお別れよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[Time to say goodbye.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[Time to say goodbye.]

MESSAGE.JP: わかれ…
MESSAGE.EN: Goodbye...
MESSAGE.Translation: Goodbye...

MESSAGE.JP: んな…
MESSAGE.EN: No way...
MESSAGE.Translation: No way...

MESSAGE.JP: やだ…そんなのはいやだ！
MESSAGE.EN: No... I don't want that!
MESSAGE.Translation: No... I don't want that!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕もいくよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm coming in too!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm coming in too!❞

MESSAGE.JP: アのほうに周り、中に入ろうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I went around to the door, trying to get in.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went around to the door, trying to get in.

MESSAGE.JP: どドアは開かなかった。施錠されていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But the door didn't open. It was locked.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the door didn't open. It was locked.

MESSAGE.JP: んな…。
MESSAGE.EN: No way...
MESSAGE.Translation: No way...

MESSAGE.JP: ラスの前に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I returned to the window pane.
MESSAGE.Translation: I returned to the window pane.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でてきてよっ、何が起きたか、説明してよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Get out of there! What happened? Tell me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Get out of there! What happened? Tell me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女の慈しむ目は変わらず、僕を見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She still had a tender look on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She still had a tender look on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 女が慈しんでいたのは、僕だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her gaze was aimed at me, her eyes full of wistful affection.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her gaze was aimed at me, her eyes full of wistful affection.

MESSAGE.JP: 静にいられず、取り乱している僕だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was seized by panic and couldn't think straight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was seized by panic and couldn't think straight.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねぇ、沙耶ったら、ねぇっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Saya, Saya!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Saya, Saya!❞

MESSAGE.JP: を呼び続けても、返事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even as I kept calling her name, she didn't reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even as I kept calling her name, she didn't reply.

MESSAGE.JP: うだ、銃があった！
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered then, I had a gun!
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered then, I had a gun!

MESSAGE.JP: れで、このガラスを撃ち抜けば、彼女を助けられる！
MESSAGE.EN: I could rescue her if I shot through the glass!
MESSAGE.Translation: I could rescue her if I shot through the glass!

MESSAGE.JP: 女に当たらないように、端に向けて撃つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I aimed away from her and toward the corner and shot.
MESSAGE.Translation: I aimed away from her and toward the corner and shot.

MESSAGE.JP: こん！というものすごい音がして、僕は驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: Clank! There was a loud sound, and I recoiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Clank! There was a loud sound, and I recoiled.

MESSAGE.JP: うなったんだ…僕は目を凝らす。
MESSAGE.EN: I strained my eyes to see what happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: I strained my eyes to see what happened.

MESSAGE.JP: ラスには傷が入っているだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was only a scratch on the glass.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was only a scratch on the glass.

MESSAGE.JP: 弾は跳ね返り、角度を変え、天井に穴を空けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The bullet rebounded at an angle, punching a hole in the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bullet rebounded at an angle, punching a hole in the ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: んな…。
MESSAGE.EN: No way...
MESSAGE.Translation: No way...

MESSAGE.JP: じ場所を狙って、僕は立て続けに銃を撃つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept shooting, aiming at the same point.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept shooting, aiming at the same point.

MESSAGE.JP: はわずかに深まっているようだが、貫通するまではまだまだだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The dent got a bit deeper, but it was still far from penetrating through.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dent got a bit deeper, but it was still far from penetrating through.

MESSAGE.JP: して、弾が切れた。
MESSAGE.EN: And I ran out of bullets.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I ran out of bullets.

MESSAGE.JP: う、僕にこのガラスを壊す手だてはない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I no longer had a way to break through the glass...
MESSAGE.Translation: I no longer had a way to break through the glass...

MESSAGE.JP: ら…助けられないじゃないか！
MESSAGE.EN: Then... I couldn't save her!
MESSAGE.Translation: Then... I couldn't save her!

MESSAGE.JP: や、もうひとつ、あったじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, there was still one way left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, there was still one way left.

MESSAGE.JP: の機関銃。あれなら、このガラスだって、ドアだって、破壊できるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The machine gun. It should be able to rip through this glass pane and door.
MESSAGE.Translation: The machine gun. It should be able to rip through this glass pane and door.

MESSAGE.JP: まりの破壊力に沙耶にも危険が及ぶけれど、他に手はない。
MESSAGE.EN: Its sheer firepower would also put Saya in danger, but there was no other way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Its sheer firepower would also put Saya in danger, but there was no other way.

MESSAGE.JP: 関銃は８階であいつと戦った場所に置きっぱなしにしてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: The machine gun was left on the 8th floor, where we were fighting the boss.
MESSAGE.Translation: The machine gun was left on the 8th floor, where we were fighting the boss.

MESSAGE.JP: りに戻ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I needed to get it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I needed to get it.

MESSAGE.JP: や、待て。ここは地下６０階だぞ。降りてくるのにもエレベーターであれだけ時間がかかったじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: No, wait. I was on the 60th floor underground. It took a lot of time to get here even with the elevator.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, wait. I was on the 60th floor underground. It took a lot of time to get here even with the elevator.

MESSAGE.JP: じ時間を今、かけてもいいのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Did I have enough time...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did I have enough time...?

MESSAGE.JP: の間に、沙耶の状況が更に危機的なものに変わるかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: In that time, wouldn't Saya's condition deteriorate...?
MESSAGE.Translation: In that time, wouldn't Saya's condition deteriorate...?

MESSAGE.JP: も、今の僕には手をこまねいて見ていることしかできない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, I my only other option would be to fold my hands and watch from here...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, I my only other option would be to fold my hands and watch from here...

MESSAGE.JP: ら、行くべきだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, I should go.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, I should go.

MESSAGE.JP: はそのことを伝える。
MESSAGE.EN: I let her know my plan.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let her know my plan.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、彼女は首を横に振り、それを制した。
MESSAGE.EN: But she turned her head to the side, holding back.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she turned her head to the side, holding back.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『理樹くん…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[Riki-kun...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[Riki-kun...]

MESSAGE.JP: 女が僕に語りかける。
MESSAGE.EN: She called out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She called out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『あたしと出会うルートは…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[The route where you meet me...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[The route where you meet me...]

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『バッドエンドなのよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[Only has a bad end.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[Only has a bad end.]

MESSAGE.JP: え？
ルート？

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『そういう終わりしか、ここにはないの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[This doesn't have any other ending.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[This doesn't have any other ending.]

MESSAGE.JP: 味がさっぱりわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea what was going on.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea what was going on.

MESSAGE.JP: 女は何を伝えようしているのか。
MESSAGE.EN: What was she trying to tell me?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was she trying to tell me?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どういうことっ、ね!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you saying, hey!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you saying, hey!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わけがわからないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't get it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't get it!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you mean by ❛ending❜!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I kept asking, nose and chin pressed tightly against the glass.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Anything else? I can at least grant you one final wish.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Then...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If we do manage to defeat you, let me have this labyrinth's hidden treasure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If we do manage to defeat you, let me have this labyrinth's hidden treasure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「…秘宝の正体は原作でもまだ明かされていない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝...It hasn't even been revealed what the treasure is in the original yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝...It hasn't even been revealed what the treasure is in the original yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「それも考えてあるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I've already thought about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I've already thought about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Is that so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Is that so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「では訊こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Tell me, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Tell me, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「おまえの探し求める秘宝…それはなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝The secret treasure you are hoping to find... what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝The secret treasure you are hoping to find... what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「…生物兵器」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝...A biological weapon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...A biological weapon.❞
