MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝One so ridiculously strong and infectious that it can even bring down a country.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝One so ridiculously strong and infectious that it can even bring down a country.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「なるほど…確かにそんな秘宝も考えられるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝I see... that certainly is plausible for a secret treasure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝I see... that certainly is plausible for a secret treasure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そう。決して見つかってはならないもの、という意味では実に相応しいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That's right. For something that must never be found, that is truly fitting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That's right. For something that must never be found, that is truly fitting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「どう？　無理？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝How about that? Is that too difficult?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝How about that? Is that too difficult?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「簡単さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝That's simple...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝That's simple...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「ただ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝Just that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝Just that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「…ただ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝...Just that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...Just that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「…本当にそれでいいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝...Are your really alright with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝...Are your really alright with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「…いいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝...It's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...It's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風@「…わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokikaze@❝...Understood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokikaze@❝...Understood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹くんは、ガラスの向こうで叫び続けている。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun continued to scream on the other side of the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun continued to scream on the other side of the window.

MESSAGE.JP: んなに取り乱して…。
MESSAGE.EN: He was so upset...
MESSAGE.Translation: He was so upset...

MESSAGE.JP: めんね。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sorry.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sorry.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹くん、ありがとう。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank you, Riki-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank you, Riki-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: びに付き合ってくれてありがとう。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank you for playing along with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank you for playing along with me.

MESSAGE.JP: 弁当食べてくれてありがとう。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank you for eating my lunch box.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank you for eating my lunch box.

MESSAGE.JP: の話に付き合ってくれてありがとう。
MESSAGE.EN: Thanks for talking about my dreams.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thanks for talking about my dreams.

MESSAGE.JP: とりでクレーンゲームして…
MESSAGE.EN: Playing a crane game by myself...
MESSAGE.Translation: Playing a crane game by myself...

MESSAGE.JP: こでは掘削作業ばかりで…
MESSAGE.EN: Breaking through each floor...
MESSAGE.Translation: Breaking through each floor...

MESSAGE.JP: ートとはほど遠いデートだったけど…ありがとう。
MESSAGE.EN: It was anything but a date, but... thank you.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was anything but a date, but... thank you.

MESSAGE.JP: 日という一日をありがとう。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank you for today.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank you for today.

MESSAGE.JP: きになってくれて、ありがとう。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank you for falling in love with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank you for falling in love with me.

MESSAGE.JP: 束を叶えさせてくれてありがとう。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank you for allowing me to keep my promise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank you for allowing me to keep my promise.

MESSAGE.JP: れが…
MESSAGE.EN: This was...
MESSAGE.Translation: This was...

MESSAGE.JP: の世界の去り方。
MESSAGE.EN: The way to leave this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: The way to leave this world.

MESSAGE.JP: れ…
MESSAGE.EN: That...
MESSAGE.Translation: That...

MESSAGE.JP: んだ、この涙は…
MESSAGE.EN: What was that? A tear...
MESSAGE.Translation: What was that? A tear...

MESSAGE.JP: かないつもりだったのに…
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I didn't want to cry...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I didn't want to cry...

MESSAGE.JP: んだか…
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow...
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow...

MESSAGE.JP: ごく泣けてきた…
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't keep myself from crying...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't keep myself from crying...

MESSAGE.JP: れ…おかしいなぁ…
MESSAGE.EN: Huh... that's strange...
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh... that's strange...

MESSAGE.JP: たしは消えなくちゃいけないのに…
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I must disappear...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I must disappear...

MESSAGE.JP: れがわかってるはずなのに…
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I understood that already...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I understood that already...

MESSAGE.JP: れ…どうしてだろ…
MESSAGE.EN: Huh... why is it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh... why is it...

MESSAGE.JP: あ、こんなに…
MESSAGE.EN: Aah...
MESSAGE.Translation: Aah...

MESSAGE.JP: たしは理樹くんも…
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun...
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun...

MESSAGE.JP: の世界も…
MESSAGE.EN: And this world...
MESSAGE.Translation: And this world...

MESSAGE.JP: 大好きだったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I loved them both so much.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I loved them both so much.

MESSAGE.JP: しさに包まれた世界で…
MESSAGE.EN: In this world cradled by kindness...
MESSAGE.Translation: In this world cradled by kindness...

MESSAGE.JP: 樹くんと同じ時間を過ごした…
MESSAGE.EN: Living at the same time as Riki-kun...
MESSAGE.Translation: Living at the same time as Riki-kun...

MESSAGE.JP: れはあたしの青春だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was my youth.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was my youth.

MESSAGE.JP: の中を精一杯に理樹くんと駆け抜けた。
MESSAGE.EN: And I spent it together with Riki-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I spent it together with Riki-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: かった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was glad...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was glad...

MESSAGE.JP: んな温かな世界に…
MESSAGE.EN: To be in that warm world...
MESSAGE.Translation: To be in that warm world...

MESSAGE.JP: 時でも居られて。
MESSAGE.EN: even for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: even for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹くんがガラスを叩いて、ずっと何かを言い続けてる。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun was still pounding on the glass and shouting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun was still pounding on the glass and shouting.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ありがとう。理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Thank you, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Thank you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@『ありがとう。理樹くん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@[Thank you, Riki-kun.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@[Thank you, Riki-kun.]

MESSAGE.JP: は時間が止まったかと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought time had stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought time had stopped.

MESSAGE.EN: That was fine. That moment, where Saya was, I wanted it to last forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was fine. That moment, where Saya was, I wanted it to last forever.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'm Tokido.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, I'm Naoe. I found this on the floor.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Naoe-kun? Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 耶。
MESSAGE.EN: Saya.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saya.

沙耶@「そうよっ、寝てたのよっ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That's right, I slept!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝As you imagined, I let my guard down and fell asleep! Even though I told you not to, I did it myself! Hilarious, right? Stupid, right? You want to laugh, right? Just laugh already!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝As you imagined, I let my guard down and fell asleep! Even though I told you not to, I did it myself! Hilarious, right? Stupid, right? You want to laugh, right? Just laugh already!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: My beloved Saya.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Don't turn around...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わ、わかってるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I k-know already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I k-know already...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You can see everything.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Okay... good... come on... just like that...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yes, GOT ITTTTTT!!　Did you see that, aren't I a genius, riight!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: The moments I had spent with my beloved Saya were coming back.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなた、そんなことで幸せになれるの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That kind of thing makes you happy...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That kind of thing makes you happy...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「…うっっっわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝...Uwaaaaah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...Uwaaaaah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「なにこれ…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What the...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝This is my first time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝This is my first time...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Irreplaceable moments.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Hphm, not at all. I just randomly threw something together, it took no more than a few seconds.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then don't be so heartbroken...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwaa... everything is soaked with the meat and potato stew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「うあああぁぁあぁぁあぁぁぁぁぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Uwaaaaaaaaaaaa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Uwaaaaaaaaaaaa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: して僕たちは奇跡の再会を果たしたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And then we had another miraculous reunion.

MESSAGE.JP: 高の幸せに満ちた風景。
MESSAGE.EN: The scene filled with utmost happiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: The scene filled with utmost happiness.

MESSAGE.JP: うか、僕たちにこの一瞬。
MESSAGE.EN: This very moment...
MESSAGE.Translation: This very moment...

MESSAGE.JP: の永遠を…
MESSAGE.EN: That eternity...
MESSAGE.Translation: That eternity...

MESSAGE.JP: ださい。
MESSAGE.EN: please give it to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: please give it to us.

MESSAGE.JP: が見ていたのは、長い悪夢だったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: It was as though I was seeing a long nightmare.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was as though I was seeing a long nightmare.

MESSAGE.EN: When I woke up, I was crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I woke up, I was crying.

MESSAGE.JP: 分のベッドの上で。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sleeping on my bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sleeping on my bed.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you awake?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you awake?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was sitting at the edge of the bed, looking at me.

MESSAGE.JP: んだか、恭介のその姿さえ懐かしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, the sight of Kyousuke alone was nostalgic.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, the sight of Kyousuke alone was nostalgic.

MESSAGE.JP: れほど、長い夢…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was that long... of a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was that long... of a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: だったら、どれだけよかったか…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...How happy would it be if that were true...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...How happy would it be if that were true...

MESSAGE.JP: の左腕についた傷が、まだじんと痛んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: The wound on my left arm still hurt.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wound on my left arm still hurt.

MESSAGE.JP: は泣き続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept crying.

MESSAGE.JP: 介はじっと待ち続けてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke kept waiting quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke kept waiting quietly.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…僕には大切なパートナーがいたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I had an important partner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I had an important partner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、いなくなってしまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But now they're gone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But now they're gone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is that so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is that so...❞

MESSAGE.EN: He looked out of the window, then turned back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked out of the window, then turned back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それと関係しているかはわからないが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know if it's related to that, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know if it's related to that, but...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I heard a story about the Darkness Executives being outsmarted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I heard a story about the Darkness Executives being outsmarted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…出し抜かれたって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... being outsmarted?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... being outsmarted?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Apparently the person they've been pursuing made an escape.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それが傑作ないいわけでさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And you know what excuse they made?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And you know what excuse they made?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝They say that person used a time machine and travelled to the past.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my eyes.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There really was a time machine?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Do you think there was one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Do you think there was one?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I don't know, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I don't know, but...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But it sounded as if there really was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But it sounded as if there really was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まったく馬鹿馬鹿しい…世界的大発見、いや宇宙的大発見じゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How silly is that... wouldn't that be an international discovery? No, a universal discovery.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How silly is that... wouldn't that be an international discovery? No, a universal discovery.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う…秘宝がタイムマシンだったら、彼女は助かっていることになる…。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right... if the secret treasure was a time machine, she could be saved...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right... if the secret treasure was a time machine, she could be saved...

MESSAGE.JP: が腕に怪我を負ったのは、確かに秘宝に辿りつく前だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was true that I received this wound on my arm, before reaching the secret treasure.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was true that I received this wound on my arm, before reaching the secret treasure.

MESSAGE.JP: こからは、僕の記憶が混乱しているとも言えるじゃないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: From then on, it could be said that my memory was hazy.
MESSAGE.Translation: From then on, it could be said that my memory was hazy.

MESSAGE.JP: んな場所で、あんな状況で冷静で居られるほうがおかしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: It would have been stranger to be calm in that kind of situation, in that kind of place...
MESSAGE.Translation: It would have been stranger to be calm in that kind of situation, in that kind of place...

MESSAGE.JP: 識の混濁が見られてもおかしくない…。
MESSAGE.EN: It wouldn't be unusual if my consciousness was clouded...
MESSAGE.Translation: It wouldn't be unusual if my consciousness was clouded...

MESSAGE.JP: ら、自分のこめかみに発砲をし、自害を図ったあの姿は、ただの幻覚だったのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Then, could that figure who pointed the gun at her temple, attempting suicide, have been a hallucination?
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, could that figure who pointed the gun at her temple, attempting suicide, have been a hallucination?

MESSAGE.JP: う信じたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to believe that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to believe that.

MESSAGE.JP: イムマシンが本当に存在して、そして誰かが過去に逃げたというのなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If a time machine really existed, and somebody used it to run to the past.
MESSAGE.Translation: If a time machine really existed, and somebody used it to run to the past.

MESSAGE.JP: れは間違いなく、彼女だから。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she would have been the one to use it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she would have been the one to use it.

MESSAGE.JP: 女は逃げ切れたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was able to escape.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was able to escape.

MESSAGE.JP: もひとつ疑問が残った。
MESSAGE.EN: One question still remained.
MESSAGE.Translation: One question still remained.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だったら…どうして、僕を連れていかなかったんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If that's the case... why didn't she take me along?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If that's the case... why didn't she take me along?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おまえまでそんなことを言い出すのか…ったく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Geez, do you actually buy this stuff too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Geez, do you actually buy this stuff too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「もし、タイムマシンが存在していてもだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Supposing the time machine really existed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Supposing the time machine really existed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「別におまえはここに留まることを選んだわけじゃないだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's not like you chose to stay here, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's not like you chose to stay here, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　どういう意味？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「言ってしまえば、おまえが生まれてさえいれば、過去にだっておまえは存在するんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In a sense, if you are living here now, you are also existing in the past, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In a sense, if you are living here now, you are also existing in the past, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「つまりだな…逃げた奴から言わせれば、時間を遡ってもまた出会えると、そう考えたんじゃないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In other words... from that person's perspective, once they go back in time they can meet you once again, no?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In other words... from that person's perspective, once they go back in time they can meet you once again, no?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それは今のおまえじゃないが、紛れもない、おまえだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That person is not the you right now, but without doubt, it's you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That person is not the you right now, but without doubt, it's you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ると…
MESSAGE.EN: That means...
MESSAGE.Translation: That means...

MESSAGE.JP: しかして…
MESSAGE.EN: Possibly...
MESSAGE.Translation: Possibly...

MESSAGE.JP: らはもう出会っているのかも…
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps we had...
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps we had...

MESSAGE.JP: れない。
MESSAGE.EN: already met.
MESSAGE.Translation: already met.

MESSAGE.JP: あれ…。
きてるや、あたし…
MESSAGE.EN: I was alive...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was alive...

MESSAGE.JP: んな馬鹿な…
MESSAGE.EN: How was this possible...
MESSAGE.Translation: How was this possible...

MESSAGE.JP: 眩しい光が差す。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A dazzling light shone.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A dazzling light shone.

MESSAGE.JP: れに手を透かせてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I held my hand against the light.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held my hand against the light.

MESSAGE.JP: れ？　小さいなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh? It was small.
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh? It was small.

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「起きたかい、あや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝Are you awake, Aya?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝Are you awake, Aya?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ？　お父さん？
MESSAGE.EN: Eh? Father?
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh? Father?

MESSAGE.JP: 父さんも無事だったの？
MESSAGE.EN: Father was alright too?
MESSAGE.Translation: Father was alright too?

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「どうした？　夢でも見てたかい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝What happened? Did you see a dream?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝What happened? Did you see a dream?❞

MESSAGE.EN: A dream...
MESSAGE.Translation: A dream...

MESSAGE.JP: んぶ夢だった…？
MESSAGE.EN: It was all a dream...?
MESSAGE.Translation: It was all a dream...?

MESSAGE.JP: んな…
MESSAGE.EN: No way...
MESSAGE.Translation: No way...

MESSAGE.JP: んなことがありえるの？
MESSAGE.EN: Was such a thing possible?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was such a thing possible?

MESSAGE.JP: も…
MESSAGE.EN: Still...
MESSAGE.Translation: Still...

MESSAGE.JP: とすれば…とても長い夢だった。
MESSAGE.EN: If it was... it was a really long dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it was... it was a really long dream.

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「どんな夢を見てたんだい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝What kind of dream did you have?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝What kind of dream did you have?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 父さん…
MESSAGE.EN: Dad...
MESSAGE.Translation: Dad...

MESSAGE.JP: ーとね…
MESSAGE.EN: Um...
MESSAGE.Translation: Um...

MESSAGE.JP: くさんの敵と戦ってた。
MESSAGE.EN: I fought a lot of enemies.
MESSAGE.Translation: I fought a lot of enemies.

MESSAGE.JP: たし、すごく強いんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was really strong.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was really strong.

MESSAGE.JP: 下迷宮でね、銃を持って、銃撃戦するんだよ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was an underground maze, and I had a gun, and I shot a lot of bullets.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was an underground maze, and I had a gun, and I shot a lot of bullets.

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「あっはっは、おてんばなあやらしい夢だなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝Ahaha, you're such a tomboy, Aya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝Ahaha, you're such a tomboy, Aya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れでね、あたしにはパートナーがいてね、その子があたしに恋しちゃうんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And then, and then, I had a partner there, and he fell in love with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then, and then, I had a partner there, and he fell in love with me.

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「あやのほうはどう思ってたんだい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝How did you feel about him, Aya?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝How did you feel about him, Aya?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はは、最後まで面と向かっては言えなかったけどね…
MESSAGE.EN: Ahaha, even at the end, I couldn't tell him that...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ahaha, even at the end, I couldn't tell him that...

MESSAGE.JP: 好きだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I loved him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I loved him.

MESSAGE.JP: 当に、大好きだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I really loved him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really loved him.

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「それもあまのじゃくなあやらしいな。伝えてあげればよかったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝You're always so obstinate, Aya. You should've just told him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝You're always so obstinate, Aya. You should've just told him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: って、初恋なのよ!?
MESSAGE.EN: But he was my first love, you know!?
MESSAGE.Translation: But he was my first love, you know!?

MESSAGE.JP: 恋って実らないっていうじゃない！
MESSAGE.EN: Don't they say first love never works out?
MESSAGE.Translation: Don't they say first love never works out?

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「誰にそんなこと吹き込まれたのやら、やれやれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝Just who put those ideas in you, my my...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝Just who put those ideas in you, my my...❞

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「じゃあ、彼にも希望はあるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝Then, I wonder if that boy has any chance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝Then, I wonder if that boy has any chance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ？　彼って？
MESSAGE.EN: Eh? Who?
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh? Who?

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「こっちに来てから、ずっと遊んでいる男の子だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝That boy you've been playing with all the time since coming here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝That boy you've been playing with all the time since coming here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「あの子、きっと、あやのことが好きなはずだよ。お父さんの予想ではね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝I'm sure he likes you. Well, that's my impression anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝I'm sure he likes you. Well, that's my impression anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなこと知らないわ。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't care about that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't care about that.

MESSAGE.JP: たしは初恋の夢から覚めたばかりだし、新しい子にすぐ乗り換えるなんて、すぐには無理よ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm still thinking about my first love from my dream. To think of someone else, that's impossible.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm still thinking about my first love from my dream. To think of someone else, that's impossible.

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「いいよ。今のは聞かなかったことにして、いつも通り遊びなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝That's fine. Forget I said that for now, just go and play as usual.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝That's fine. Forget I said that for now, just go and play as usual.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah.

MESSAGE.JP: れ？　でも不思議だな。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh? That's strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh? That's strange.

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「どうしたんだい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 方、りきくんなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Both of them are Riki-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both of them are Riki-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「はっはっは、じゃあこっちでも両思いじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝Hahaha, then maybe it's mutual over here too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝Hahaha, then maybe it's mutual over here too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーん、あいつはまだまだよ。これからってところね。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, this guy still had a ways to go. This would just be the start.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, this guy still had a ways to go. This would just be the start.

MESSAGE.JP: っと男の子らしくなったら、まあ、デートに誘ってあげてもいいかな？
MESSAGE.EN: If he was more manly, then maybe... I'd ask him out on a date?
MESSAGE.Translation: If he was more manly, then maybe... I'd ask him out on a date?

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「あやは厳しいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝Aya sure is strict.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝Aya sure is strict.❞

MESSAGE.JP: お父さん@「じゃ、ほら、いきなさい。ボールはいつものところだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Father@❝Well, here, go and play ball at the usual place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Father@❝Well, here, go and play ball at the usual place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah.

MESSAGE.JP: っそぼーーっ！　りっきくーーーん！
MESSAGE.EN: Let's playyyyy! Ri-ki-kuuun!
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's playyyyy! Ri-ki-kuuun!
